org.agilewiki.utils.immutable

Interface FactoryRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRegistry, CascadingRegistry, DbFactoryRegistry, Registry

    public interface FactoryRegistry
    A durable factory registry.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long MAX_TIME
      A time after all insertions and deletions.
      static char NULL_ID 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(char id)
      Returns the factory for the given id.

      Map an immutable class to an immutable factory instance.

      Map an immutable object to an immutable factory instance.

      Read an id and map it to a durable factory instance.

        A time after all insertions and deletions.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(ImmutableFactory factory)
        Register a durable factory.
        Parameters:
        factory - The factory to be registered.

      • getImmutableFactory

        ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(char id)
        Returns the factory for the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of an immutable factory.
        Returns:
        The immutable factory, or null.

      • getImmutableFactory

        ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(java.lang.Object immutable)
        Map an immutable object to an immutable factory instance. Nulls are mapped to the registered NullFactory.
        Parameters:
        immutable - The immutable object, or null.
        Returns:
        The immutable factory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the immutable class is not recognized.

      • getImmutableFactory

        ImmutableFactory getImmutableFactory(java.lang.Class immutableClass)
        Map an immutable class to an immutable factory instance.
        Parameters:
        immutableClass - The immutable class.
        Returns:
        The immutable factory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the immutable class is not recognized.

      • readId

        ImmutableFactory readId(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Read an id and map it to a durable factory instance.
        Parameters:
        byteBuffer - The byte buffer to be read.
        Returns:
        The durable factory instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the durable id is not recognized.
